title: i cant get to the log in page
body: ok so today I was in the middle of playing a game with a few mates, when my computer shut down. I logged back in and restarted everything but then I couldn't get onto the client. it come up with "a file has been removed" so I uninstalled and installed it again hoping it would fix the issue. it didn't. I can open up the client now, but I cant get to the login. ive tried to repair it at least 10 times now, but it still isn't letting me go to the login page. someone plz help?

replies.body: Did you install the updated client before receiving this error?  It sounds like the installation did not go well, so a reinstall was a solid step to take.  You could be having network problems if you're unable to connect to the authentication servers.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection can get through.  Hope it helps!
